Class WordCount

java.lang.Object
WordCount
public class WordCount
extends java.lang.Object
Assignment Description Write a text analyzer that reads a file and outputs statistics about that file. It should output the word frequencies of all words in the file, sorted by the most frequently used word. The output should be a set of pairs, each pair containing a word and how many times it occurred in the file.
Author:
alayan2
